...At last we meet.1�

...Finally! We finally meet face to face!1�

Treat her well...1�
Splendid!From this day forth, I belong to you.1�

...Thou hast found me.1�

...What has happened to me?1�

And now I, too, can rest unburdened...1�
Thou art blessed this day.1�

You hear a voice from out of nowhere...1�
...You have found me.1�
Allow me to show my respect.You who have gained the strength of so many must be a true hero.1�
But first...1�
Who are you?1�
This must be some sort of joke.You are the new wielder of this weapon?1�
Hmmm, perhaps I have misjudged you.With your level of skill, you may be able to handle this beastly blade, and have the will to control its awesome power.1�
However, this is a magical blade. It is a sword that calls upon destruction. Its malice will gnaw away at your body and soul even as you topple enemies with its strength.1�
Do not forget this truth! Keep it always in your mind.My regards go with you, stranger...1�
Now, my heroic master...1�

You hear a voice from out of nowhere...1�
...You...me, meet.1�
Me...free...Thanks to you. Me, your...1�
What the...?1�
Ah, now I see.The wheel has turned.1�
Truthfully spoken, I am thankful.�#���� is a splendid axe, but ever does it hunger.1�
I have taken many lives to sate its need, and have reached the end of my strength.1�
You have my gratitude.You have freed me from my nightmare, and now I can sleep with a tranquil spirit...1�
You, master, me.Good, work. Me, thank, you.1�
Master, me, hunger.Go, hunt? Find, prey?Me, cut, flesh. Break, bone. Drink, blood.Master, me, hunger...1�
You hear a voice from out of nowhere...1�
...Ah, you found me!1�
I have been freed from a world where life and death, reality and illusion are impossible to tell apart.I am truly grateful.1�
One moment...1�
...This is...Jeuno!?Have I finally returned?1�
I... Nobody can see me.This is merely a reflection of reality.Which means you are the one to inherit the axe.1�
Hmm. With your polished skills, you will make a fine master for #����.1�
The one who wields this axe must also be beautiful to look upon. Apparently, I was a suitable candidate. Do you not agree?1�
Congratulations.I expect you to perform great deeds from this day onwards.I also ask that someday you use #���� to avenge the Hydra Corps...1�
I congratulate you also...my new master.1�
Now hold me high and let my blade glint in the sunlight!Let your friends, as well as your enemies, feast upon my glorious beauty!1�
You hear a voice from out of nowhere...1�
...You have found me.1�
My forbidden power is now yours, and I am liberated from my prison.1�
You have but to gain her respect...1�
Such a long dream I was having...1�
It was a dream held captive by a shrouded world.No. I must accept that it was no dream.1�
And you? Do you seek the same darkness that I did...It seems you have already found your way to #����.1�
Very well, I will pass it on to you.But do not forget how much blood your companions spilled in your search for its unholy strength.1�
And think long and hard on whether or not this power should be used. Do not end up like me...1�
Heh. Heh heh.Hahahahahahaha!1�
Well, my new master, is it not time to begin the journey for ever greater power?There are enemies yet to fell, and blood yet to spill...1�
You hear a voice from out of nowhere...1�
...You have unearthed me at last.1�
I am free from Dynamis, free to fly through the heavens once more.1�
All that remains is...1�
Hello?Is it possible that I...1�
But, no.I have not returned to this realm...You. You are to be my successor?1�
You certainly seem to have the required skill with the lance. Enough to convince #���� to lend you its power, at any rate.1�
Having this spear on the battlefield makes you a match for almost any opponent.1�
Think well on what this means, and on how a weapon like this should be used.You have my admiration, adventurer. You have done well...1�
The ceremony of inheritance is complete.1�
It is time for you to go forth and experience my overwhelming strength...1�
You hear a voice from out of nowhere...1�
...I have been rediscovered at last.1�
Thanks to you, I have made my escape from the shrouded land.1�
You must now gain the sanction of my master...1�
It is a pity, indeed.1�
This day has come far too soon for my liking.1�
However, you are a master of the ninja trade.I concede that you will make a fitting wielder of the #����.1�
Take this blade as your own.Travel far down the path of the ninja.1�
I will be watching you from the shadows...1�
A fine master...1�
My keen edge is now yours to wield. A sharpness said to make even demons wail...1�
You hear a voice from out of nowhere...1�
...This day has finally come.1�
I am to be released to this world for the first time in an age.Is this reason to celebrate, or despair...?1�
In any event...1�
What is going on here?1�
Ah, my successor has come.1�
I sought to master the way of the samurai, and traveled to the Far East for training. By the time I had gained the #���� and returned to my home, the Great War had begun.1�
When I think on it, my life has been a long road of trials. But to see the arrival of my successor makes me feel that all has not been in vain.1�
You have my gratitude.Farewell, #����...1�
It has been a hard path to reach this point.1�
But your journey in the way of the samurai has just begun.You have yet to attain perfection.Let us continue your training...1�

...So, you have found me.1�
I must give you my thanks.I have been freed from the hell of Dynamis and can regain my true power once again.1�
And now...1�
Hwaah!1�
Just when I thought I had finally returned to this world, I find you standing here, ready to snatch my precious staff away.1�
Well, it's for the best, I suppose.In my current state, #���� is nothing more than an ornament, its power going to waste.1�
I entrust this staff to you!Take up #����,  , and bind it to you in a contract of blood!1�
I take my leave of you now.I only wish that I was able to stay a little longer...1�
I am yours to wield.1�

...You have discovered my resting place.1�

Ah, one more test of your patience...1�
